CustomField.formula: NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(TransportationMode__c)) || ISBLANK(TEXT(Status__c)) || ISBLANK(LoadingDate__c) ) && ISPICKVAL(TransportationMode__c, "Route") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Reception") && NOW() > DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(LoadingDate__c) & " 3:00:00") /* 3:00:00Z のGMT = 12時JST */
CustomField.label: 路線便受付遅延フラグ
